suite.name: Amazon Testes Gherkin

test.name: Caso de Teste #4 - Remover Produto do Carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Dado que estou na home page da Amazon.com.br
Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: E eu pesquiso pelo produto "Xbox Series S"
Digitar o nome de produto "Xbox Series S" no campo de pesquisa
kw.sourcename: Digitar o nome de produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field 'id:twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: E o título da página deve ficar "Amazon.com.br : Xbox Series S"
Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E um produto da linha "Xbox Series S" deve ser mostrado na página
Verificar o resultado da pesquisa, se listando o "Xbox Series S" pesquisado
kw.sourcename: Verificar o resultado da pesquisa, se listando o "${PRODUTO}" pesquisado

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Xbox Series S'.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Amazon.com.br : Xbox Series S'.

kw.name: E eu adiciono "Xbox Series S" ao carrinho
Adicionar o produto "Console Xbox Series S" no carrinho
Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E a página confirmará que "Xbox Series S" foi adicionado com sucesso
Verificar se o produto "Console Xbox Series S" foi adicionado com sucesso
kw.sourcename: Verificar se o produto "${PRODUTO}" foi adicionado com sucesso

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Adicionado ao carrinho'.

kw.name: Quando eu excluir o produto do meu carrinho
Remover o produto "Console Xbox Series S" do carrinho
Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//input[contains(@aria-label,'Excluir Console Xbox Series S')]'.

kw.name: Então a mensagem "Seu carrinho de compras da Amazon está vazio." aparecerá
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Seu carrinho de compras da Amazon está vazio.'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica a remoção de um produto no carrinho de compras

suite.doc: Essa suite testa o site da Amazon.com.br
